text: Getting my favorite tea
Drink secured! Grass jelly tea. It's not too sweet and is considered a cool, refreshing drink in Chinese culture. My recent go to.
The air here smells earthy, like the smell of mulch. Also a little sweet.
The quiet always takes me by surprise whenever I leave the city. It's feels as if time has stopped
Was chilly after getting out of the car but walking is starting to help
Sees tall hill, must climb tall hill
The recent wind effected this area quite a lot, the plants look battered and damaged
I remember coming out here with W and A once. We had a little bubble blower thing that we used to make bubbles in the wind.
The trail is a bit muddy today, watching my step
Also remember coming here with J. It's been a few years since I've heard from her. It was probably for the best to let some distance grow between us. Hope she is well.
I remember I brought my dog, Kona, that time. We had a picnic on the hill. Kona loved it, she took a bite out of my sandwich when I wasn't looking.
She's getting older now, thinking it'd be nice to take her here again sometime
I wish there was a way for people to leave little memories and personal stories at a place for other people to discover.
Could just be a QR code that people scan to read and leave stories. Though anytime you're making an app like that, moderation can become necessary unfortunately. Will think about this some moreâ€¦
Made it to the center
I like looking at the glowing lights of houses nestled in the grooves of a mountain. I think one day, I'll find my own mountain like that.
Cold hands. Cold face. Picking up the pace.
Felt like Dr. Suess after that last one
Doing some sleuthing
People take Christmas pretty seriously up here

Overall, nice community and area. Passed by all the schools and seems like a tight knit place to raise a kid. Reminds me a bit of my own neighborhood growing up. House-wise, I think I'd like something that wasn't on such a grid-like street. One that has more space to expand and grow with changing interests and needs. That could have a studio I could walk to across the way like the Eames house.
For a challenge, I'm gonna try to drive home without maps
Having nettle leaf tea
